t.app.aboutMe.title: About me
t.app.aboutMe.subtitle1: Hello, I`m Beatrice. My hometown is Caltagirone, located in the inland of Sicily. I`ve always studied in Caltagirone at the "Steve Jobs" Academy, where I delved into Digital Marketing and visual communication. Later, I moved to Milan for work, specializing in Digital Art Direction and UI/UX Design.
t.app.aboutMe.subtitle2: If you`d like to learn more, I encourage you to download my Curriculum Vitae below
